title: Everything is Connected to Narayana in Loving Service | @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.key_quote: Everything is related to Vasudeva, Narayana.
segments.summary: The speaker draws an analogy between customer focus in business and the Vedas, lokas, and sacrifices being focused on Narayana, emphasizing that everything derives meaning and value from its connection to Him.
